      • castleCheck

        public boolean castleCheck(King p,
                           int xRel,
                           int yRel,
                           boolean isDebug,
                           AbstractPiece[][] gamestate,
                           int moveNo)
        Checks if a player can castle
        Parameters:
        p - King of the player
        xRel - relative movement of the King on the X axis
        yRel - relative movement of the King on the Y axis
        isDebug - is debug mode active
        gamestate - current gamestate
        moveNo - current move number
        Returns:
        true if player is able to castle, false if not
